Basics.abstract: I always have colourful dreams, and I always transfer content of dreams into my artworks. They are the inspiration of my artworks.

dreams.title: Lost in the Desert
dreams.description: I found myself wandering aimlessly through a vast desert landscape, with the scorching sun beating down relentlessly. The sand stretched out in all directions, and I felt a deep sense of isolation and vulnerability.

events.name: Searching for Water
events.description: I stumbled across dunes of sand, desperately searching for any sign of water. My throat was parched, and the heat was unbearable. It felt like a never-ending quest.

events.name: Encounter with a Mirage
events.description: In the distance, I saw what appeared to be an oasis shimmering in the heat haze. With renewed hope, I hurried towards it, only to realize it was a cruel mirage, disappearing as I approached.

dreams.title: Confronting a Fear
dreams.description: I was faced with my greatest fear in a dark, ominous forest. Every step I took felt heavy with dread, but I knew I had to confront it.

events.name: Facing the Fear
events.description: As I delved deeper into the forest, my fear intensified. But with each step, I felt a growing sense of determination to overcome it. Eventually, I confronted the source of my fear and found it to be less daunting than I had imagined.

events.name: Emerging Victorious
events.description: After facing my fear head-on, I emerged from the forest with a newfound sense of courage and resilience. It was a triumphant moment, knowing that I had conquered something that once held power over me.
